title: Online Training Course on Risk-Based Inspection of Food Imports

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Workplace training for employee skill enhancement, blended learning utilizing self-directed online modules in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can determine import food inspection priorities with 80% accuracy by applying Risk-Based Inspection (RBI) principles.
Learners can explain in three or more steps the procedure for establishing inspection plans by linking HACCP and RBI.
Learners can classify risk levels using a Risk Assessment Tool (RA Tool) in real import cases and compile results into a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
